segments.cn: 所以动物“bear”和“bear with me”拼写是一样的。

segments.en: It looks exactly like the animal, but we're not talking about the animal.
segments.cn: 它看起来和动物完全一样，但我们不是在谈论动物。

segments.en: No, we're asking someone to tolerate something that's annoying or frustrating.
segments.cn: 不，我们是在请求某人容忍一些令人烦恼或沮丧的事情。

segments.en: So, for example, I'm trying to show you a file on my computer, Marco.
segments.cn: 所以，例如，我试图在我的计算机上给你展示一个文件，马尔科。

segments.en: My computer's not working.
segments.cn: 我的计算机不工作。

segments.en: I say, please bear with me a second.
segments.cn: 我说，请耐心等我一下。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: I have to reboot my computer.
segments.cn: 我需要重启我的计算机。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: We have to wait here.
segments.cn: 我们得在这里等。

segments.en: Okay, very good.
segments.cn: 好的，非常好。

segments.en: Now, towards the end of the dialogue, when we talked about to crop up, the second part of that, Mr. Ford said, unfortunately, technical problems do crop up from time to time.
segments.cn: 现在，在对话的最后，当我们谈到“crop up”时，福特先生说，不幸的是，技术问题确实会不时出现。

segments.en: So we already discussed cropped up.
segments.cn: 所以我们已经讨论过“cropped up”。

segments.en: What is time to time mean?
segments.cn: “time to time”是什么意思？

segments.en: From time to time.
segments.cn: “从时间到时间”。

segments.en: Okay, think of this as a set phrase, because we said already that you could also say sometimes.
segments.cn: 好的，把这个视为一个固定短语，因为我们已经说过你也可以说“有时”。

segments.en: So from time to time means every once in a while or...
segments.cn: 所以“从时间到时间”意味着偶尔或...

segments.en: Occasionally.
segments.cn: 偶尔。

segments.en: So it's an adverbial phrase.
segments.cn: 所以这是一个副词短语。

segments.en: It's a way of telling people how often something happens.
segments.cn: 这是告诉人们某事发生频率的方式。

segments.en: But in this case, it's not very common.
segments.cn: 但在这种情况下，它并不常见。

segments.en: So, for example, you can say, I like to go to the movies from time to time.
segments.cn: 例如，你可以说，我喜欢偶尔去看电影。

segments.en: That's right.
segments.cn: 没错。

segments.en: So maybe once or twice a month you like to go to the movies.
segments.cn: 所以也许每个月你喜欢去看一两次电影。

segments.en: But what if I come to work every day?
segments.cn: 但如果我每天来上班呢？

segments.en: Do I come to work from time to time?
segments.cn: 我是偶尔来上班吗？

segments.en: No.
segments.cn: 不。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: Okay, so from time to time is rarely or occasionally.
segments.cn: 好吧，所以“从时间到时间”是很少或偶尔。

segments.en: Not very often.
segments.cn: 不常。

segments.en: Exactly.
segments.cn: 正是。

segments.en: All right.
segments.cn: 好的。

segments.en: Very good.
segments.cn: 非常好。

segments.en: So now let's listen to our dialogue one last time and review everything we've just learned.
segments.cn: 现在让我们最后一次听我们的对话，复习一下我们刚刚学到的内容。

segments.en: Okay, so if we could dim the lights, Jonathan, we can kick off with the first TV advert.
segments.cn: 好吧，如果我们可以调暗灯光，Jonathan，我们可以开始第一个电视广告。

segments.en: Please note that we are still in the early days with this advert, so it might seem a bit rough around the edges.
segments.cn: 请注意，我们在这个广告的早期阶段，所以它可能看起来有点粗糙。

segments.en: Okay, so I just need to click this and the advert should pop up on the screen.
segments.cn: 好吧，我只需要点击这个，广告就应该在屏幕上弹出。

segments.en: Hmm.
segments.cn: 嗯。

segments.en: Sorry about this.
segments.cn: 对不起。

segments.en: Bear with me a second.
segments.cn: 请稍等我一下。

segments.en: There seems to be a problem with the projector.
segments.cn: 投影仪似乎有问题。

segments.en: Let me see.
segments.cn: 让我看看。

segments.en: Jonathan, could you lend a hand a second?
segments.cn: Jonathan，你能帮我一下吗？

segments.en: It looks like the projector is not recognizing the computer.
segments.cn: 看起来投影仪没有识别电脑。

segments.en: Let me check the connection a second.
segments.cn: 让我检查一下连接。

segments.en: Well, the connection seems okay and the computer is running normally.
segments.cn: 嗯，连接似乎正常，电脑也在正常运行。

segments.en: Hmm.
segments.cn: 嗯。

segments.en: Okay, sorry guys.
segments.cn: 好吧，抱歉大家。

segments.en: Obviously a problem with the system.
segments.cn: 显然是系统出现了问题。

segments.en: Let's just reboot and start over.
segments.cn: 我们重启一下，重新开始。

segments.en: Let's see if this resolves the issue.
segments.cn: 看看这是否能解决问题。

segments.en: Right.
segments.cn: 对。

segments.en: Let's try again.
segments.cn: 再试一次。

segments.en: No, still nothing, Michael.
segments.cn: 不，还是没有，Michael。

segments.en: There might be a technical issue with the projector.
segments.cn: 投影仪可能有技术问题。

segments.en: I think maybe the projector has overheated.
segments.cn: 我想投影仪可能过热了。

segments.en: We might need to cool it down for 10 minutes and start again.
segments.cn: 我们可能需要冷却10分钟再重新开始。

segments.en: I'll call IT support to come over right now.
segments.cn: 我现在就打电话给IT支持。

segments.en: Okay, guys.
segments.cn: 好吧，大家。

segments.en: Unfortunately, technical problems do crop up from time to time, don't they?
segments.cn: 不幸的是，技术问题偶尔会出现，不是吗？

segments.en: But it's not a huge problem.
segments.cn: 但这不是大问题。

segments.en: In the meantime, while the IT guys get to work on that, I can talk a little bit more about the advertising concept and what we are looking to achieve overall with this campaign.
segments.cn: 在此期间，当IT人员处理这个问题时，我可以多谈谈广告概念以及我们希望通过这个活动实现的目标。

segments.en: Alright, so this was part 7 of our presentation series.
segments.cn: 好吧，这是我们演示系列的第7部分。

segments.en: And actually these type of problems occur very, very often.
segments.cn: 实际上，这类问题发生得非常非常频繁。

segments.en: Specifically with the laptop and the projector and sometimes it doesn't work, it doesn't recognize it.
segments.cn: 特别是笔记本电脑和投影仪，有时它不工作，无法识别。

segments.en: And so this is a nice way of handling it.
segments.cn: 所以这是一个很好的处理方式。

segments.en: This is, and we hope that these are phrases that you can use in your daily life as well.
segments.cn: 这是，我们希望这些短语你们也能在日常生活中使用。

segments.en: Maybe you're working with your colleagues and you're having some technical problems.
segments.cn: 也许你在和同事一起工作时遇到一些技术问题。

segments.en: Or if you're having a problem and someone gives you instructions for how to solve that problem, like I often get this from my technical team.
segments.cn: 或者如果你遇到问题，有人给你解决问题的指示，就像我经常从我的技术团队那里得到的。

segments.en: I say, listen, I have a problem.
segments.cn: 我说，听着，我有个问题。

segments.en: And they say, hey, just reboot your computer and it will be okay.
segments.cn: 他们说，嘿，只需重启你的电脑就可以了。

segments.en: So these are very, very common issues that I think that you can learn how to describe in English with today's lesson.
segments.cn: 所以这些是非常非常常见的问题，我认为你可以通过今天的课程学会如何用英语描述。

segments.en: Alright, very good.
segments.cn: 好吧，非常好。

segments.cn: 当然，如果你们对这个或我们任何课程有任何问题或疑虑，请访问我们的网站，EnglishPod.com。

segments.cn: 在课程页面上，你可以留下你的评论和问题。

segments.cn: 我们下次再见。

segments.cn: 再见。

segments.cn: 笑声。
